structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: The laws relating to exemptions as set out in KRS Chapter 427 are applicable to the individual units which shall have the benefit of said exemption in those cases the same as in ownership of any other property.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 381, sec. 11. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 156. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 205, sec. 15.
